nodes.text: A female individual once attended the Rigovian Technical University with Raith Sienar, a prominent engineer during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. She was involved in the design of a model of assassin droid, though the model was a failure due to its obvious appearance, and that they were prone to kill their owners. At some point prior to or during 29 BBY, she was killed by one of these droids.
This individual was mentioned in Greg Bear's Rogue Planet, a novel released in May 2000.
